data.name: Molecats - Original Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
Molecats - Original Soundtrack - Track listing:
01 - Murmuring the Fire
02 - Day in an Onsen
03 - Backlights
04 - Walkie-Talkie
05 - Meowmories About You
06 - Good Joke
07 - Molecats on Mars
08 - Molecat Twist
09 - Industrial Revolution
10 - Comfortably Dumb
11 - Vault Swing
12 - Mushroom Fields Forever
13 - Piano Bar
14 - Snowman Childhood
15 - Bowie Soup
16 - From Meowheart
17 - Midnight Snack
18 - Late-Night TV
19 - Molecat Noir
20 - Tormashka
21 - Molecats Theme
22 - Go March!
23 - Meewow
24 - Kitchen Orchestra
25 - Agrofitocennoz
Total Length: 82:32

The Dilettant Orchestra is:

Music by
Vasiliy Kashnikov
Nickolai Balinoff

Mixing & mastering
Nickolai Balinoff

Quotes & reactions:
“10 garbage containers out of 10!”
“Reminds me Frank Zappa...”
“In the best tradition of Terry Scott Taylor!!”
“I’ve got a сhronic headache out of this:E”
“Share your ‘shrooms with me, pls!”

data.short_description: It is seven almost randomly selected (it’s a lie) tracks from Molecats OST by The Dilettant Orchestra. More track we will add with Release game from Early Access.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 (64 bit)
  • Processor: Dual Core 2 GHz
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4600 (AMD or NVIDIA equivalent)
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 202 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MacOS
  • Processor: Intel Pentium
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: internal
  • Storage: 202 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04
  • Processor: Intel Pentium
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce 9XX or AMD
  • Storage: 202 MB available space
